title: Can Riot please use player reform techniques to abolish meta?
body:
The whole "It's justified for me to verbally abuse you for not following the meta" attitude really sucks, and when you do win, it's either silence, "The enemy team was just bad", or "You just got fed and lucky, anyone can win while being fed", while it's suddenly "report for trolling with champion pick" when you end up doing badly, even when everyone else does.

Riot, please turn the meta into a general guideline by adding an "open minded" honour along with teamwork and the other three ones, along with adding loading screen + ingame tips to allow these picks. Being called a troll for things like Karma or Morgana mid instead of supp (And they're intended to function in these roles FYI), while being praised for going Yi/Shyvanna devourer jg or runeglaive ezreal mid and getting the amount of kills expected while it was broken is absolutely unfair.

replies.body: I don't really see the problem you get XD I like playing off meta every now and then and everyone's fine with it... Well at lest they don't flame and call troll

Morgana mid troll??  I highly doubt the examples you gave are situation's you have found yourself in. Morgana mid is actually rather common.. Seen a few karma mid's as well.. But imo riot have already got rid of the meta to an extent. Ya know they are trying to push morde bot lane right? Thats gotta be one of the furthest from the meta there can be.

It hasn't happened to me specifically with Morgana, but people have spammed "report morgana" in chat for going mid and not bot in games I play. Karma is also meant to be mid, they're both designed to be used in mid actually. I've had an Ashe spam "report Karma for not supping" in one of my _normal_ games.
